trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> objects that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager" /> control.
You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> class to programmatically manage a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> objects.
trans-unit.target: Sie können die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> Klasse, um einen Satz von programmgesteuert verwalten <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> Objekte.

trans-unit.source: Note that it is more typical to define these fields declaratively instead of programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Beachten Sie, dass es häufiger vor, um diese Felder deklarativ anstatt programmgesteuert definieren.

trans-unit.source: You can access the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> class through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Sie erreichen die Eigenschaften und Methoden von der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> -Klasse über die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Fields%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> Eigenschaft.

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, and remove <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> objects by using the appropriate methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Können Sie hinzufügen, einfügen und entfernen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> Objekte mithilfe der entsprechenden Methoden von der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> Klasse.

trans-unit.source: To programmatically retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> objects from a collection, do one of following:
trans-unit.target: Um programmgesteuert abrufen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> Objekte aus einer Auflistung, führen Sie eine der folgenden:

trans-unit.source: Use the indexer to get a single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Verwenden Sie einen Indexer zum Abrufen einer einzelnes <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> Objekt aus der Auflistung.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which you can then use to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Verwenden Sie die <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> Methode, um ein Objekt zu erstellen, implementiert <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>, das Sie dann Elemente aus der Auflistung abzurufen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> property gets the total number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> -Eigenschaft ruft die Gesamtanzahl der Elemente in der Auflistung ab.

trans-unit.source: It is typically used to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Es wird normalerweise verwendet, um die Obergrenze für die Auflistung zu bestimmen.

trans-unit.source: You can add items and remove items in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Sie können Elemente hinzufügen und Entfernen von Elementen in der Auflistung mithilfe der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Remove%2A>, und <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> Methoden.

trans-unit.source: The control that will contain the collection.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> class.
This constructor is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Dieser Konstruktor wird hauptsächlich von Steuerelemententwicklern verwendet.

trans-unit.source: The object to append to the collection.
Appends the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object to the collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> Objekt am Ende der Auflistung hinzugefügt wird.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Add%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> object to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: Das folgende Beispiel zeigt, wie Sie die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Add%2A> -Methode zum Hinzufügen einer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField> -Objekt an eine <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> Steuerelement.

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the collection.
Creates a copy of the current collection.
An object that contains a copy of each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object that is in the current collection.
This method is primarily used in design-time dialog boxes to implement rollback behavior when an operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird in erster Linie in Dialogfeldern zur Entwurfszeit verwendet, um Rollback Verhalten zu implementieren, wenn eine Operation abgebrochen wird.

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> collection.
Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection contains the specified field; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection.
The array object must use zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying starts.

Copies the complete <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object, starting at the specified index of the target array.

The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> type to create from the ordered list of types that are returned by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.GetKnownTypes" /> method.
Creates a default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> type that is identified by the provided index.
An object that represents an instance of a class that is derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> class, according to the index provided.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> method is called internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> collection in its implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> Methode wird aufgerufen, intern von der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> Auflistung in seiner Implementierung von der <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A> Methode.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> method creates an instance of an object by using the type identified by the specified `index`, which maps to one of the types returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.CreateKnownType%2A> Methode erstellt eine Instanz eines Objekts mit dem Typ entsprechen, die durch das angegebene identifiziert `index`, welche Zuordnungen auf einen der Typen von zurückgegebenen die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> Methode.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is not in the recognized range.
Occurs when the fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection change.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> event is usually raised as a result of a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Remove%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> Ereignis wird in der Regel infolge eines Aufrufs für die <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Remove%2A>, oder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> Methoden.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen zur Behandlung von Ereignissen finden Sie unter [NIB: Behandeln von Ereignissen](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> types that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection can contain.
An array of type objects that identify the types of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> objects that the collection can contain.
The object to locate in the collection.
Gets the index of a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object in the collection.
The index of the <paramref name="field" /> parameter, if it is found in the collection; otherwise, -1.
The zero-based index at which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object will be inserted.
The object to insert.
Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object to retrieve from the collection.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object that is at the specified index in the collection.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object that is at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> -Objekt, das am angegebenen Index in der Auflistung ist.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional processing after all items are removed from the collection.
This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> method to perform additional processing after all items are removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird aufgerufen, indem Sie die <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Clear%2A> Methode, um zusätzliche Verarbeitung auszuführen, nachdem alle Elemente aus der Auflistung entfernt werden.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode löst die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> Ereignis.

trans-unit.source: The index in the collection that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object was inserted at.
The object that was inserted into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection.
Performs additional processing after an item is added to the collection.
This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Insert%2A> method to perform additional processing after an item is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird aufgerufen, indem Sie die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Insert%2A> Methode, um zusätzliche Verarbeitung auszuführen, nachdem ein Element der Auflistung hinzugefügt wird.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode löst die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> Ereignis.

trans-unit.source: The index in the collection that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object was removed from.
The object that was removed from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection.
Performs additional processing after an item is removed from the collection.

This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to perform additional processing after an item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird aufgerufen, indem Sie die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.Remove%2A> oder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.RemoveAt%2A> Methode, um zusätzliche Verarbeitung auszuführen, nachdem ein Element aus der Auflistung entfernt wird.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode löst die <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection.FieldsChanged> Ereignis.

trans-unit.source: The object to validate.
Verifies that the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object.
This method is called internally to validate an element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird intern aufgerufen, um zu überprüfen, ob ein Element von der <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection> Auflistung.

trans-unit.source: The method performs type-checking and verifies that the object specified in the `o` parameter is not `null`.
trans-unit.target: Die Methode führt Typprüfung und stellt sicher, dass das angegebene Objekt in der `o` -Parameter ist kein `null`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="o" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="o" /> is not an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> class or of one of its derived classes.
The object to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection.
The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object to remove.
Removes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object at the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCollection" /> collection.
The object to mark as changed since the last time that view state was loaded or saved.
Instructs the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField" /> object to record its complete state to view state, instead of recording only changed information.
This method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Diese Methode wird hauptsächlich von Steuerelemententwicklern verwendet.
